get.description: Gets all active attendee types for the company.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting point of the next set of results, after the limit specified in the limit field has been reached.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return. Default value: 25

get.summary: Get a single attendee type by ID
get.description: Gets an attendee type by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the attendee type.

delete.summary: Delete an attendee type by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the attendee type to delete.

put.summary: Update an attendee type by ID
put.description: Updates the specified attendee type. Only the fields provided in the supplied object will be updated. Missing fields will not be altered.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the attendee type.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The partial or complete AttendeeType object to update.

AllowAttendeeCountEditing.description: Determines whether users are allowed to edit the count for this attendee type. Format: true or false

AllowManuallyEnteredAttendees.description: Determines whether users are allowed to add attendees for this attendee type. Format: true or false

AttendeeFormID.description: The unique identifier for the attendee form for this attendee type.

Code.description: A code that indicates the type of attendee. Examples: EMPLOYEE, SPOUSE, BUSGUEST. Maximum length: 40 characters

ConnectorID.description: The unique identifier for the Application Connector that is the data source for this attendee type. When this field is empty, the Expense database is the data source.

items.description: The URI of the next page of results, if any.

DuplicateSearchFields.description: The list of Attendee field IDs used by the Add Attendee user interface to alert users that the attendee they want to add is a possible duplicate. This parent element has a DuplicateSearchField child element for each field ID.

ID.description: The unique identifier of the resource.

Name.description: The name for the attendee type. This name must be unique. Maximum length: 40 characters

AllowAttendeeCountEditing.description: Determines whether users are allowed to edit the count for this attendee type. Format: true or false

AllowManuallyEnteredAttendees.description: Determines whether users are allowed to add attendees for this attendee type. Format: true or false

AttendeeFormID.description: The unique identifier for the attendee form for this attendee type.

Code.description: A code that indicates the type of attendee. Examples: EMPLOYEE, SPOUSE, BUSGUEST. Maximum length: 40 characters

ConnectorID.description: The unique identifier for the Application Connector that is the data source for this attendee type. When this field is empty, the Expense database is the data source.

items.description: The URI of the next page of results, if any.

Name.description: The name for the attendee type. This name must be unique. Maximum length: 40 characters

AllowAttendeeCountEditing.description: Determines whether users are allowed to edit the count for this attendee type. Format: true or false

AllowManuallyEnteredAttendees.description: Determines whether users are allowed to add attendees for this attendee type. Format: true or false

AttendeeFormID.description: The unique identifier for the attendee form for this attendee type.

Code.description: A code that indicates the type of attendee. Examples: EMPLOYEE, SPOUSE, BUSGUEST. Maximum length: 40 characters

ConnectorID.description: The unique identifier for the Application Connector that is the data source for this attendee type. When this field is empty, the Expense database is the data source.

items.description: The URI of the next page of results, if any.

DuplicateSearchFields.description: The list of Attendee field IDs used by the Add Attendee user interface to alert users that the attendee they want to add is a possible duplicate. This parent element has a DuplicateSearchField child element for each field ID.

Name.description: The name for the attendee type. This name must be unique. Maximum length: 40 characters

NextPage.description: The URI of the next page of results, if any.

ID.description: The URI of the next page of results, if any.

URI.description: The URI of the next page of results, if any.
